text: "Take a Chance on Me" is a disco song by the Swedish music group ABBA. It was released in January 1978. The song reached the Top 10 in the United States and United Kingdom. It hit #3 in the United States, Germany and Canada. It was also ABBA's seventh #1 song in the United Kingdom. It sold over 500,000 copies. It was awarded a gold disc. The song was later covered by the English synthpop group Erasure and the Swedish pop group A-Teens. ==References== Category:ABBA songs Category:1978 songs Category:Erasure songs
title: Take a Chance on Me
